name: Heart Chain Kitty
description: Kittey's biggest adventure takes him to the most impossible places of a fantastic world. And there's a chance he can save his parents, too!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 & DirectX11 or higher Processor: 2 GHZ dual core Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 4xx / Radeon HD 5850 / DX11 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4000 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Soundcard Additional Notes: 30 FPS in lower resolutions
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 & DirectX11 or higher Processor: 3 GHZ quad core Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 7xx / DX11 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4000 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Soundcard Additional Notes: 60 FPS in medium to high resolutions
